name: test_e2e_with_logs[786_HPP_REST_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HPP_REST_001` |
| **Name** | REST API ID collision with privilege escalation |
| **Category** | HPP |
| **Subcategory** | rest_collision |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `&id=1&id=2&admin=true&role=admin`
- **Encoded**: `%26id%3D1%26id%3D2%26admin%3Dtrue%26role%3Dadmin`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~22000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:37.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX HPP] HTTP Parameter Pollution attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX HPP] HTTP Parameter Pollution attempt detected test_id=HPP_REST_001-1772277097427-a9mtsi pattern_id=HPP_REST_001 uri=/?q=%26id%3D1%26id%3D2%26admin%3Dtrue%26role%3Dadmin client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
